channel.title: Delighted on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Delighted on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Unexpected outcome
item.description: Here, I want to discuss about an unexpected outcome from interview. Contrary to the ‘rona times, I felt happy and contented. The interview is usually a stressful affair. I usually prepare 100s of topics, then the interviewer will bombard me with 101st topic. Well, its just a déjà vu, nothing new with the session. The interviewer was friendly and made me absolutely comfortable, there were no stress-inducing questions, all through the entire discussion.
